metadata.synopsis: The player attempts to remove their tadpole with the device, not realising that it will kill them as it does so. The player has opportunity to save themselves from the machine. If they fail or refuse those opportunities, Daisy will intervene. Variations based on whether the doctor and Lae'zel are present or not.
metadata.how_to_trigger: start game with new character, add companions using oe debugbookloadlevel CRE_Main_Ateleport S_CRE_Doctoras a companion, speak w doctorsay your friend needs a tadpole removedswitch to plyr and speak with doctoraccept help and interact with zaith'isk

29.speaker: Player
29.text: The zaith'isk. Vlaakith's purity, distilled. My duty. My right.
29.context:
CinematicNodeContext: A psychic forcefield emerges, 'locking in' the player's head to the Zaith'isk.
Player's face is a picture of discomfort.

60.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
60.text: Take your place in the zaith'isk. Purification awaits.
60.context:
CinematicNodeContext: A psychic forcefield emerges, 'locking in' the player's head to the Zaith'isk.
Player's face is a picture of discomfort.

53.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
53.text: You're infected too, child? How fortunate you crossed my path. Take a seat.
53.context:
CinematicNodeContext: A psychic forcefield emerges, 'locking in' the player's head to the Zaith'isk.
Player's face is a picture of discomfort.

151.context:
CinematicNodeContext: A psychic forcefield emerges, 'locking in' the player's head to the Zaith'isk.
Player's face is a picture of discomfort.

91.speaker: Player
91.context:
CinematicNodeContext: A psychic forcefield emerges, 'locking in' the player's head to the Zaith'isk.
Player's face is a picture of discomfort.

4.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
4.text: Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith. Call to your queen!
4.context: NodeContext: cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith. Vlaakith's will above all.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith. My Queen, hear me!
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: The psionic forcefield intensifies (brightness/colour/size/otherwise). NodeContext: cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith. Vlaakith's will above all. Spoken with increasing furor.

164.speaker: Player
164.context: CinematicNodeContext: The machine rumbles/shudders  it's being pushed to its capacityNodeContext: Lae'zel in absolute torture.  lahsh-ah-KLAH! Make me pure!

21.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
21.context: NodeContext: Responding to Daisy who she hears in her head.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: No... stop talking... I don't understand... NO!
39.context: NodeContext: Responding to Daisy who she hears in her head.

74.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
74.text: My child! To whom do you speak?

156.text: Damn it all! What has the zaith'isk torn from me? My Queen, why do you forsake me?

13.speaker: Player
13.text: Damn it all! What has the zaith'isk torn from me? My Queen, why do you forsake me?

124.speaker: Player
124.text: Ngh! Vlaakith tavki na'zin. Vlaakith tavki na'zin!
124.context: NodeContext: VLAH-kith TAHV-key nah-ZINN. Lae'zel reacts to the initial pain, then chants a meditation phrase, trying to stay calm in the face of the coming agony.

67.speaker: Narrator
67.text: *The zaith'isk. In its unnatural embrace lies the hope of being cured. You feel your parasite stir.*
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player does not immediately sit down - there's no knowing what this machine will do.

115.speaker: Narrator
115.text: *Smoke rises like hot breath, but whatever semblance of life once powered the zaith'isk is gone.*
115.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player does not immediately sit down - there's no knowing what this machine will do.

128.speaker: Narrator
128.text: *The device is strange, made of taut flesh and pockmarked metal. It waits for something.*
128.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player does not immediately sit down - there's no knowing what this machine will do.

82.speaker: Player
82.text: I thought your friend was the one infected?

75.speaker: Player
75.text: I thought your friend was the one infected?

1.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
1.text: I thought your friend was the one infected?

2.speaker: Player
2.context: NodeContext: Not impressed, wants to get this over with.

149.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
149.text: As I suspected. Take a seat.
149.context: NodeContext: Not impressed, wants to get this over with.

109.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
109.text: There is nothing on any plane stronger than a zaith'isk for curing unwanted afflictions.
109.context: CinematicNodeContext: The doctor gestures insistently for you to lie down in the machine.

31.speaker: Player
31.context: NodeContext: Chk - guttural sounding version of 'tsk'.

206.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
206.text: Purification is your duty. The pain is hardly relevant.
206.context: NodeContext: Chk - guttural sounding version of 'tsk'.

45.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
45.context: NodeContext: Chk - guttural sounding version of 'tsk'.

105.speaker: Player
105.text: Look to your companions for guidance.

161.speaker: Lae'zel
161.text: You deny me my due, then seek my comfort? Bah. Sit, and be pure.

111.speaker: Player
111.text: Look to your companions for guidance.

79.speaker: Wyll
79.text: It's only a horrific machine of unspeakable form. What's the worst that could happen?

154.speaker: Shadowheart
154.text: I don't like the look of this thing. Its 'cure' could be a metal bolt punched through your skull.

121.speaker: Karlach
121.text: Never stick your head in an extraplanar torture device. A rule to live by.
121.context: NodeContext: Player's asking Astarion if they should use a dangerous machine to remove the tadpoles

9.speaker: Astarion
9.text: I'm all for it, but... well, you first.
9.context: NodeContext: Player's asking Astarion if they should use a dangerous machine to remove the tadpoles

168.speaker: Gale
168.text: Well... could go either way. But we came this far - should at least try.

160.speaker: Player
160.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player lays down in the zaith'isk.

95.text: *Your body grows cold, its warmth sapped by the cold metal seat. The machine awakens.*
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player lays down in the zaith'isk.

176.text: *Your body grows cold, its warmth sapped by the cold metal seat. The machine awakens.*
176.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Zaith'isk 'warms up' to a low hum.

3.speaker: Narrator
3.text: *Your body grows cold, its warmth sapped by the cold metal seat. The machine awakens.*
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Zaith'isk 'warms up' to a low hum.

42.text: You must focus on the parasite at all times. The zaith'isk will do the rest.
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: The 'head' part of the machine descends and the jaws clamp around the player's head, neck, shoulders.  The player squirms uncomfortably - they can't move.

135.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
135.text: You must focus on the parasite at all times. The zaith'isk will do the rest.
135.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The doctor fusses, checks everything is set up correctly.
NodeContext: Instructive - this is very important

33.text: *Layers of magic weave themselves tightly around your head. The tadpole squirms and contracts. It's trying to hide.*
33.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The mandibles of the Zaith'isk move towards the player's forehead, as if to puncture it. 
The player grimaces.

22.speaker: Narrator
22.text: *Layers of magic weave themselves tightly around your head. The tadpole squirms and contracts. It's trying to hide.*
22.context:
CinematicNodeContext: A psychic forcefield emerges, 'locking in' the player's head to the Zaith'isk.
Player looks worried

142.speaker: Player
142.text: *The device possesses immense, but unfocused, power. If you fail to direct it towards the tadpole, your faculties could face permanent harm.*
142.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player's face suddenly convulses as the machine starts to search through their brain

71.text: *The device possesses immense, but unfocused, power. If you fail to direct it towards the tadpole, your faculties could face permanent harm.*
71.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player's face suddenly convulses as the machine starts to search through their brain

152.speaker: Narrator
152.text: *The device possesses immense, but unfocused, power. If you fail to direct it towards the tadpole, your faculties could face permanent harm.*
152.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player's face suddenly convulses as the machine starts to search through their brain

46.speaker: Narrator
46.text: *You realise the device is hunting your parasite. But it's doing so blindly. Without direction, your faculties could be permanently damaged.*
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player's face suddenly convulses as the machine starts to search through their brain

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Your skull groans and bends under the pressure. Then - agony.*
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player's face suddenly convulses as the machine starts to search through their brain

125.speaker: Player
125.text: Follow the ghustil's instruction. Seek the tadpole.

23.speaker: Narrator
23.text: *Through waves of torment, you search for the parasite's lurking presence.*

170.speaker: Narrator
170.text: *Through waves of torment, you search for the parasite's lurking presence.*

6.speaker: Narrator
6.text: *The device searches too. You sense its hunger, its craving. It wants the tadpole, but maybe something more...*
6.context: NodeContext: Slight unease - this is taking longer than usual

49.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
49.text: Keep going, my child. The ghaik spawn will soon be gone.
49.context: NodeContext: Slight unease - this is taking longer than usual

145.speaker: Player
145.text: This torment. You - you must persist. You must be cleansed!
145.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player's pain intensifies. The zaith'isk's forcefield grows stronger.

198.speaker: Lae'zel
198.text: This torment. You - you must persist. You must be cleansed!
198.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player's pain intensifies. The zaith'isk's forcefield grows stronger.

88.speaker: Player
88.text: *Your vision narrows. You sense myriad spectres of githyanki past. This is their fate. This is their anguish.*
88.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player's pain intensifies. The zaith'isk's forcefield grows stronger.

55.speaker: Narrator
55.text: *Your vision narrows. You sense myriad spectres of githyanki past. This is their fate. This is their anguish.*
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player's pain intensifies. The zaith'isk's forcefield grows stronger.

101.speaker: Narrator
101.text: *You feel yourself ebbing away, while the parasite only grows stronger. It's evolving.*

48.speaker: Player
48.text: Remember your orders. Bring the device closer.

140.speaker: Narrator
140.text: That's it, you're almost there. The zaith'isk never fails.

194.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
194.text: That's it. Soon your suffering will be over, kin.

136.speaker: Narrator
136.text: *The device yearns for the creature, for every part of you tainted by its presence. You will be consumed.*
136.context: CinematicNodeContext: The machine rumbles/shudders  it's being pushed to its capacity

62.speaker: Narrator
62.text: *The tadpole quivers. A different magic is building within it. This one is ancient. Rotten.*
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: The machine rumbles/shudders  it's being pushed to its capacity

32.context: CinematicNodeContext: The machine rumbles/shudders  it's being pushed to its capacity

54.speaker: Lae'zel
54.text: Pursue the visions you saw. See where they lead.
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player arches/ their eyes roll back in their head. This is the peak of their agony.

7.speaker: Narrator
7.text: *Your life is laid bare among those that came before. Your innermost thoughts are turned to silver thread and relayed to the Astral Sea.*

16.speaker: Narrator
16.text: *Your life is laid bare among those that came before. Your innermost thoughts are turned to silver thread and relayed to the Astral Sea.*

90.speaker: Narrator
90.text: *The voices of the dead cry out as one. The zaith'isk collects memories from the infected - and executes them. It is not for curing. It's for killing.*

203.text: *The pain is too great. The visions flicker but refuse to come into focus.*

52.speaker: Narrator
52.text: *The pain is too great. The visions flicker but refuse to come into focus.*

209.speaker: Player
209.text: Complete your purification. Surrender to Vlaakith's will.
209.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player arches/ their eyes roll back in their head. This is the peak of their agony.

97.speaker: Narrator
97.text: *Finally, the device makes contact. You feel your spirit unravelling, drawn from you in sinewy threads.*
97.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player arches/ their eyes roll back in their head. This is the peak of their agony.

196.speaker: Narrator
196.text: *Finally, the device makes contact. You feel your spirit unravelling, drawn from you in sinewy threads.*

34.speaker: Narrator
34.text: *Your body is a leaden husk, abandoned as you drift along the threads into the darkness. Death awaits.*

187.text: *Unable to find its target, the device unleashes indiscriminately through your body.*
187.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player arches/ their eyes roll back in their head. This is the peak of their agony.

87.speaker: Narrator
87.text: *Unable to find its target, the device unleashes indiscriminately through your body.*
87.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player arches/ their eyes roll back in their head. This is the peak of their agony.

35.speaker: Narrator
35.text: *You feel joints breaking, your blood vessels rupturing. Your body crumples. Your heart shudders.*

18.speaker: Player
18.text: Pray for deliverance. Flood the creature with divine power.
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player arches/ their eyes roll back in their head. This is the peak of their agony. No visualisation of the magic/power being used - it's insdie their head.

26.speaker: Narrator
26.text: *You pour yourself into the tadpole's putrid magic. Its strength multiplied, it unleashes on the machine.*
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player arches/ their eyes roll back in their head. This is the peak of their agony. No visualisation of the magic/power being used - it's insdie their head.

58.speaker: Narrator
58.text: *You pour yourself into the tadpole's putrid magic. Its strength multiplied, it unleashes on the machine.*
58.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player arches/ their eyes roll back in their head. This is the peak of their agony. No visualisation of the magic/power being used - it's insdie their head.

184.speaker: Narrator
184.text: *The two forces fuse violently together, your brain their conduit. Your body and mind drift apart - you are being undone.*

72.text: *The tadpole senses your interference. It withdraws, coiling the putrid magic tightly within.*

143.speaker: Narrator
143.text: *The tadpole senses your interference. It withdraws, coiling the putrid magic tightly within.*

155.speaker: Player
155.text: Focus on this ancient magic. Feed it with your own.
155.context: NodeContext: with a smile, has no intention of getting you out

148.speaker: Player
148.text: Follow the strange magic to its source.
148.context: NodeContext: with a smile, has no intention of getting you out

77.speaker: Player
77.text: LET THE TADPOLE FEED ON YOUR RAGE. MAKE IT STRONG.
77.context: NodeContext: with a smile, has no intention of getting you out

61.speaker: Player
61.context: NodeContext: with a smile, has no intention of getting you out

177.speaker: Narrator
177.text: *Your limbs are unresponsive, cut off by the device's magic. You can't move.*
177.context: NodeContext: with a smile, has no intention of getting you out

63.speaker: Player
63.context: NodeContext: with a smile, has no intention of getting you out

178.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
178.text: The zaith'isk is the only thing that can help you now.
178.context: NodeContext: with a smile, has no intention of getting you out

57.speaker: Player
57.text: The pain. It's - it's too much. Can't. Endure.
57.context: InternalNodeContext: The player is confused. Where is this voice coming from?

166.speaker: Lae'zel
166.text: The pain. It's - it's too much. Can't. Endure.
166.context: InternalNodeContext: The player is confused. Where is this voice coming from?

56.speaker: Player
56.text: I will not let this happen to you!
56.context: InternalNodeContext: The player is confused. Where is this voice coming from?

131.text: I will not let this happen to you!
131.context: InternalNodeContext: The player is confused. Where is this voice coming from?

132.text: *The room swims back into focus. Inside your head, you feel a familiar squirm. You escaped, but so did your tadpole.*
132.context: CinematicNodeContext: We see the forcefield recede, then expand out suddenly. In a burst of bright light, the Zaith'isk explodes. The player has been blown aside by the explosion.

86.text: *The room swims back into focus. Inside your head, you feel a familiar squirm. You escaped, but so did your tadpole.*
86.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is disoriented, woozy. They stagger to their feet, put a hand to their head as they react to the tadpole's presence

188.speaker: Narrator
188.text: *The room swims back into focus. Inside your head, you feel a familiar squirm. You escaped, but so did your tadpole.*
188.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is disoriented, woozy. They stagger to their feet, put a hand to their head as they react to the tadpole's presence

110.speaker: Narrator
110.text: *The room swims back into focus. Your mind is intact, yet unfamiliar. Inside it, the tadpole lives on. And you feel different.*
110.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is disoriented, woozy. They stagger to their feet, put a hand to their head as they react to the tadpole's presence

64.speaker: Narrator
64.text: *The room swims back into focus. Your mind is fractured, but intact. Inside it, the tadpole lives on. And you feel different.*
64.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is disoriented, woozy. They stagger to their feet, put a hand to their head as they react to the tadpole's presence

174.speaker: Narrator
174.text: *The room swims back into focus as sensation returns to your body. You are intact. As is your tadpole.*
174.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is disoriented, woozy. They stagger to their feet, put a hand to their head as they react to the tadpole's presence

38.speaker: Narrator
38.text: *The room swims back into focus. You are intact, but no longer whole. The tadpole arches in satisfaction - it lives on.*
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is disoriented, woozy. They stagger to their feet, put a hand to their head as they react to the tadpole's presence

37.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
37.text: No - NO. The zaith'isk... What have you done?

11.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
11.text: And yet you live, and so does your parasite.

96.speaker: Player
96.text: *Her voice cuts with a fanatical edge - an obsession bordering on mania. If there's a chance the parasite lives, she wants it.*
96.context: NodeContext: pondering this as she speaks

28.speaker: Narrator
28.text: *Her voice cuts with a fanatical edge - an obsession bordering on mania. If there's a chance the parasite lives, she wants it.*
28.context: NodeContext: pondering this as she speaks

20.speaker: Narrator
20.text: *Her voice cuts with a fanatical edge - an obsession bordering on mania. If there's a chance the parasite lives, she wants it.*
20.context: NodeContext: pondering this as she speaks

113.speaker: Player
113.text: The parasite lives, yes. And thank goodness - it saved me.
113.context: NodeContext: pondering this as she speaks

70.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
70.context: NodeContext: pondering this as she speaks

114.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
114.text: And it destroyed a zaith'isk... Then its power is even more unique than I thought. I must examine it.
114.context: NodeContext: pondering this as she speaks

65.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
65.text: Since the zaith'isk did not extract it, we must resort to more traditional means.
65.context: NodeContext: She's lying - she's going to call the guards

73.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
73.text: Wait here. I will gather my tools.
73.context: NodeContext: She's lying - she's going to call the guards

92.speaker: Player
92.text: Your zaith'isk tried to kill me. And failed.
92.context: NodeContext: pissed off - how dare you accuse her machinery of failing!

89.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
89.context: NodeContext: pissed off - how dare you accuse her machinery of failing!

200.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
200.text: The only variable in this experience was you - and your parasite. And I will uncover how this happened.

199.speaker: Player
199.text: You're wrong. The parasite's dead. I felt it die.
199.context: InternalNodeContext: She's going to call the guards to kill you, but doesn't want to tip you off.

14.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
14.text: Really? Then - all this destruction was a symptom of its power... Incredible.
14.context: InternalNodeContext: She's going to call the guards to kill you, but doesn't want to tip you off.

129.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
129.text: Really? Then - all this destruction was a symptom of its power... Incredible.

59.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
59.text: I am disappointed that we could not extract it alive. It would have been an exceptional specimen.

130.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
130.text: In any case, your problem is resolved. Leave me. I must salvage what I can.

159.text: You're lying. You're protecting it. I knew it - the parasite has burrowed deeper than I thought. It already owns you.
159.context: InternalNodeContext: She's going to call the guards to kill you, but doesn't want to tip you off.

76.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
76.text: You're lying. You're protecting it. I knew it - the parasite has burrowed deeper than I thought. It already owns you.
76.context: InternalNodeContext: She's going to call the guards to kill you, but doesn't want to tip you off.

119.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
119.text: We must extract it from you as soon as possible.
119.context: InternalNodeContext: She's going to call the guards to kill you, but doesn't want to tip you off.

85.speaker: Player
85.text: Pretend the zaith'isk wiped your memories and you don't know what she's talking about.

123.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
123.text: Hmmm... The zaith'isk must have damaged you when it was destroyed.

150.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
150.text: Hmmm... The zaith'isk must have damaged you when it was destroyed.

68.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
68.text: Frustrating. I should have liked to have found out what happened.

51.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
51.text: But I've no use for gibbering idiots. Leave me.

169.text: This childish display is fooling no one.

179.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
179.text: This childish display is fooling no one.

12.text: *There's something in her voice that goes beyond rage - curiosity, perhaps, or regret. Whatever it is, you cannot identify it.*

84.speaker: Narrator
84.text: *There's something in her voice that goes beyond rage - curiosity, perhaps, or regret. Whatever it is, you cannot identify it.*

78.speaker: Player
78.text: There's got to be a way to stop this thing!

167.speaker: Shadowheart
167.text: There's got to be a way to stop this thing!

193.speaker: Astarion
193.text: What are you doing? Turn it off!

138.speaker: Wyll
138.text: Enough, already - we need to stop this thing!

183.speaker: Gale
183.text: There has to be a way to stop this thing!

81.speaker: Karlach
81.text: There's got to be some way to stop this thing!

208.speaker: Halsin
208.text: There must be some way to stop this.

103.speaker: Player
103.context: InternalNodeContext: The player is confused. Where is this voice coming from?

189.speaker: Narrator
189.text: *You urge your body from the chair with every fibre of your consciousness, but can't lift so much as a finger.*
189.context: InternalNodeContext: The player is confused. Where is this voice coming from?

116.text: This is a death wish. I won't allow it.
116.context: InternalNodeContext: The player is confused. Where is this voice coming from?

190.text: *The device misses its mark, searing the back of your skull. The world grows dimmer, your perception weakens.*

47.speaker: Narrator
47.text: *The device misses its mark, searing the back of your skull. The world grows dimmer, your perception weakens.*

139.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
139.text: Focus! The procedure is almost complete.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: Enough is enough. Get out now.

80.speaker: Narrator
80.text: *The parasite burrows deeper, sinking its teeth into your brain's exposed tissue. It sucks greedily.*
80.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player's pain intensifies. The zaith'isk's forcefield grows stronger.

106.speaker: Player
106.text: This 'cure' looks set to kill you - get out!

158.speaker: Shadowheart
158.text: This 'cure' looks set to kill you - get out!

172.speaker: Astarion
172.text: It's too much, you can't take it. Get out of there, now!

122.speaker: Wyll
122.text: Hells - I've got a bad feeling about this.

171.speaker: Gale
171.text: That's no cure - it's going to kill you. Get out!

112.speaker: Karlach
112.text: This can't be right. That things going to kill you - move, now!

205.speaker: Halsin
205.text: That contraption looks set to kill you, not save you. Get clear of it, at once!

83.text: *The machine lashes out aimlessly. Your right temple burns, then numbs. Part of you is gone - a part you can no longer recall.*
83.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player's face contorts in agony

24.speaker: Narrator
24.text: *The machine lashes out aimlessly. Your right temple burns, then numbs. Part of you is gone - a part you can no longer recall.*
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player's face contorts in agony

207.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
207.text: Hmm. An unusually stubborn specimen. Don't let it slip away.
207.context: NodeContext: Slight unease - this is taking longer than usual

185.speaker: Player
185.text: Focus the device on your tadpole.

25.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
25.text: My time is not yours to waste. Do you have a tadpole or not?

144.speaker: Player
144.text: I do. Please - get it out of me.

98.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
98.text: To sit in the zaith'isk is a rare blessing, kin. Be grateful.

147.speaker: Narrator
147.text: *To the weak, the zaith'isk may look a horror. To a githyanki, it holds the promise of purity.*
147.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player does not immediately sit down - there's no knowing what this machine will do.

153.speaker: Narrator
153.text: *The zaith'isk. This unnatural device offers your best chance of purification.*
153.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player does not immediately sit down - there's no knowing what this machine will do.
